snippet: Stocks closed with modest losses after several companies posted disappointing quarterly results. The market was coming off a three-day rally.
abstract: Stocks fall after three-day rally, reflecting slowdown in escalation of oil prices.
lead_paragraph: Stocks closed with modest losses after several companies posted disappointing quarterly results. The market was coming off a three-day rally.

headline.main: Market Takes Step Back After Corporate Earnings Disappoint
headline.print_headline: Market Retreats After Corporate Earnings Disappoint
